translations.jp: イニストラードを覆う影

cards.flavor:
"We pray to Avacyn on high.
On snow-white wings fearless you fly.
Keep safe our souls. Keep safe our lives.
May angels watch us from the skies."
—Children's prayer
cards.name: Always Watching
cards.text: Nontoken creatures you control get +1/+1 and have vigilance.

cards.name: Angel of Deliverance
cards.text:
Flying
Delirium — Whenever Angel of Deliverance deals damage, if there are four or more card types among cards in your graveyard, exile target creature an opponent controls.

cards.flavor: "We must save you from yourselves."
cards.name: Angelic Purge
cards.text:
As an additional cost to cast Angelic Purge, sacrifice a permanent.
Exile target artifact, creature, or enchantment.

cards.flavor: For some customers, the old apothecary shop still opens its doors.
cards.name: Apothecary Geist
cards.text:
Flying
When Apothecary Geist enters the battlefield, if you control another Spirit, you gain 3 life.

cards.name: Archangel Avacyn
cards.text:
Flash
Flying, vigilance
When Archangel Avacyn enters the battlefield, creatures you control gain indestructible until end of turn.
When a non-Angel creature you control dies, transform Archangel Avacyn at the beginning of the next upkeep.

cards.flavor:
"Wings that once bore hope are now stained with blood. She is our guardian no longer."
—Grete, cathar apostate
cards.name: Avacyn, the Purifier
cards.text:
Flying
When this creature transforms into Avacyn, the Purifier, it deals 3 damage to each other creature and each opponent.

cards.flavor: "We come bearing the word of Avacyn and the Lunarch Council."
cards.name: Avacynian Missionaries
cards.text: At the beginning of your end step, if Avacynian Missionaries is equipped, transform it.

cards.flavor: "We come bearing the tools of confession and absolution."
cards.name: Lunarch Inquisitors
cards.text: When this creature transforms into Lunarch Inquisitors, you may exile another target creature until Lunarch Inquisitors leaves the battlefield.

cards.name: Bound by Moonsilver
cards.text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature can't attack, block, or transform.
Sacrifice another permanent: Attach Bound by Moonsilver to target creature. Activate this ability only any time you could cast a sorcery and only once each turn.

cards.name: Bygone Bishop
cards.text:
Flying
Whenever you cast a creature spell with converted mana cost 3 or less, investigate. (Create a colorless Clue artifact token with "{2}, Sacrifice this artifact: Draw a card.")

cards.flavor:
"Unwavering and loyal, they represent stability in uncertain times."
—Rem Karolus, Slayer of Angels
cards.name: Cathar's Companion
cards.text: Whenever you cast a noncreature spell, Cathar's Companion gains indestructible until end of turn. (Damage and effects that say "destroy" don't destroy it.)

cards.flavor: "There was a time when the purpose of the church was to heal and protect. I would see that time return."
cards.name: Chaplain's Blessing
cards.text: You gain 5 life.

cards.flavor: "The harder they try to extinguish my faith, the brighter it burns in the darkness."
cards.name: Dauntless Cathar
cards.text: {1}{W}, Exile Dauntless Cathar from your graveyard: Create a 1/1 white Spirit creature token with flying. Activate this ability only any time you could cast a sorcery.

cards.flavor: The message was clear to Sorin—Nahiri had paid Markov Manor a visit.
cards.name: Declaration in Stone
cards.text: Exile target creature and all other creatures its controller controls with the same name as that creature. That player investigates for each nontoken creature exiled this way.

cards.flavor: Above the cries, a phrase rang out: "You will all be saved."
cards.name: Descend upon the Sinful
cards.text:
Exile all creatures.
Delirium — Create a 4/4 white Angel creature token with flying if there are four or more card types among cards in your graveyard.

cards.flavor: On expeditions through Ashmouth, the hunters of Devilthorn Lodge rely on the cleverness of foxes to counteract the mischief of devils.
cards.name: Devilthorn Fox
Drogskol Cavalry
cards.text:
Flying
Whenever another Spirit enters the battlefield under your control, you gain 2 life.
{3}{W}: Create a 1/1 white Spirit creature token with flying.

cards.flavor: The barrier between existence and oblivion is thinner than you know.
cards.name: Eerie Interlude
cards.text: Exile any number of target creatures you control. Return those cards to the battlefield under their owner's control at the beginning of the next end step.

cards.name: Emissary of the Sleepless
cards.text:
Flying
When Emissary of the Sleepless enters the battlefield, if a creature died this turn, create a 1/1 white Spirit creature token with flying.

cards.flavor:
"The call of the Blessed Sleep is not so strong as the call to protect those in need."
—Saint Traft
cards.name: Ethereal Guidance
cards.text: Creatures you control get +2/+1 until end of turn.

cards.flavor:
"Only the pure stand tall in the light."
—Sigarda
cards.name: Expose Evil
cards.text:
Tap up to two target creatures.
Investigate. (Create a colorless Clue artifact token with "{2}, Sacrifice this artifact: Draw a card.")

cards.name: Gryff's Boon
cards.text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets +1/+0 and has flying.
{3}{W}: Return Gryff's Boon from your graveyard to the battlefield attached to target creature. Activate this ability only any time you could cast a sorcery.

cards.flavor: Her reputation inspires both loyalty and adoration.
cards.name: Hanweir Militia Captain
cards.text: At the beginning of your upkeep, if you control four or more creatures, transform Hanweir Militia Captain.

cards.name: Westvale Cult Leader
cards.text:
Westvale Cult Leader's power and toughness are each equal to the number of creatures you control.
At the beginning of your end step, create a 1/1 white and black Human Cleric creature token.

cards.flavor: "I have given my life to the church, my soul to Avacyn, and my heart to the people."
cards.name: Hope Against Hope
cards.text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets +1/+1 for each creature you control.
As long as enchanted creature is a Human, it has first strike.

cards.flavor: "The element of surprise only works when it's backed up by a bolt between the eyes."
cards.name: Humble the Brute
cards.text:
Destroy target creature with power 4 or greater.
Investigate. (Create a colorless Clue artifact token with "{2}, Sacrifice this artifact: Draw a card.")

cards.flavor: Many fields now lie fallow in Gavony, as the oxen have been confiscated to perform other duties.
cards.name: Inquisitor's Ox
cards.text: Delirium — Inquisitor's Ox gets +1/+0 and has vigilance as long as there are four or more card types among cards in your graveyard.

cards.flavor: "Our enemies will soon discover that we are not as meek as they had believed."
cards.name: Inspiring Captain
cards.text: When Inspiring Captain enters the battlefield, creatures you control get +1/+1 until end of turn.

cards.flavor: "I am an instrument of the church wielded against Avacyn's enemies."
cards.name: Militant Inquisitor
cards.text: Militant Inquisitor gets +1/+0 for each Equipment you control.

cards.flavor: It has no apparent purpose or direction. It simply drifts, buoyed by breezes both tangible and otherworldly.
cards.name: Moorland Drifter
cards.text: Delirium — Moorland Drifter has flying as long as there are four or more card types among cards in your graveyard.

cards.flavor: "Sorin, I'm going to take everything from you."
cards.name: Nahiri's Machinations
cards.text:
At the beginning of combat on your turn, target creature you control gains indestructible until end of turn.
{1}{R}: Nahiri's Machinations deals 1 damage to target blocking creature.

cards.name: Nearheath Chaplain
cards.text:
Lifelink
{2}{W}, Exile Nearheath Chaplain from your graveyard: Create two 1/1 white Spirit creature tokens with flying. Activate this ability only any time you could cast a sorcery.

cards.flavor: Visit the dead, and they may return the favor.
cards.name: Not Forgotten
cards.text: Put target card from a graveyard on the top or bottom of its owner's library. Create a 1/1 white Spirit creature token with flying.

cards.name: Odric, Lunarch Marshal
cards.text: At the beginning of each combat, creatures you control gain first strike until end of turn if a creature you control has first strike. The same is true for flying, deathtouch, double strike, haste, hexproof, indestructible, lifelink, menace, reach, skulk, trample, and vigilance.

cards.flavor: "Once Avacyn returned, I hoped I'd never need these things again. I didn't think I'd be dusting them off to use against angels."
cards.name: Open the Armory
cards.text: Search your library for an Aura or Equipment card, reveal it, and put it into your hand. Then shuffle your library.

cards.flavor: The mind is perfectly capable of creating its own monsters.
cards.name: Paranoid Parish-Blade
cards.text: Delirium — Paranoid Parish-Blade gets +1/+0 and has first strike as long as there are four or more card types among cards in your graveyard.

cards.flavor: "My faith guides my hand . . ."
cards.name: Pious Evangel
cards.text:
Whenever Pious Evangel or another creature enters the battlefield under your control, you gain 1 life.
{2}, {T}, Sacrifice another permanent: Transform Pious Evangel.

cards.flavor: ". . . and I will prove my devotion."
cards.name: Wayward Disciple
cards.text: Whenever Wayward Disciple or another creature you control dies, target opponent loses 1 life and you gain 1 life.

cards.flavor: "If you refuse to see the light, then you will feel it."
cards.name: Puncturing Light
cards.text: Destroy target attacking or blocking creature with power 3 or less.

cards.name: Reaper of Flight Moonsilver
cards.text:
Flying
Delirium — Sacrifice another creature: Reaper of Flight Moonsilver gets +2/+1 until end of turn. Activate this ability only if there are four or more card types among cards in your graveyard.

cards.flavor:
"Shield yourself with faith. Arm yourself with silver."
—Slayer Kastinne
cards.name: Silverstrike
cards.text: Destroy target attacking creature. You gain 3 life.

cards.flavor: The restless geists of common folk often continue their lifelong labors.
cards.name: Spectral Shepherd
cards.text:
Flying
{1}{U}: Return target Spirit you control to its owner's hand.

cards.flavor: "I'm sure you have a story. Everyone has a story. You can tell it to the bars."
cards.name: Stern Constable
cards.text: {T}, Discard a card: Tap target creature.

cards.flavor:
"We fight not for Avacyn, but for her ideals; not for the church, but for its people."
—Thalia, Guardian of Thraben
cards.name: Strength of Arms
cards.text: Target creature gets +2/+2 until end of turn. If you control an Equipment, create a 1/1 white Human Soldier creature token.

cards.flavor: The longest nights are measured not in hours, but in heartbeats.
cards.name: Survive the Night
cards.text:
Target creature gets +1/+0 and gains indestructible until end of turn. (Damage and effects that say "destroy" don't destroy it.)
Investigate. (Create a colorless Clue artifact token with "{2}, Sacrifice this artifact: Draw a card.")

cards.flavor: Thalia established the Order of Saint Traft in an effort to bring together cathars who would stand against the corruption of the Lunarch Council.
cards.name: Tenacity
cards.text: Creatures you control get +1/+1 and gain lifelink until end of turn. Untap those creatures.

cards.name: Thalia's Lieutenant
cards.text:
When Thalia's Lieutenant enters the battlefield, put a +1/+1 counter on each other Human you control.
Whenever another Human enters the battlefield under your control, put a +1/+1 counter on Thalia's Lieutenant.

cards.flavor: "If you've been at this as long as I have, nothing can surprise you. That's the hope, at least."
cards.name: Thraben Inspector
cards.text: When Thraben Inspector enters the battlefield, investigate. (Create a colorless Clue artifact token with "{2}, Sacrifice this artifact: Draw a card.")

cards.name: Topplegeist
cards.text:
Flying
When Topplegeist enters the battlefield, tap target creature an opponent controls.
Delirium — At the beginning of each opponent's upkeep, if there are four or more card types among cards in your graveyard, tap target creature that player controls.

cards.flavor: "You'll never believe what I heard."
cards.name: Town Gossipmonger
cards.text: {T}, Tap an untapped creature you control: Transform Town Gossipmonger.

cards.flavor: Rumors are sparks: gather enough of them and something's going to catch fire.
cards.name: Incited Rabble
cards.text:
Incited Rabble attacks each combat if able.
{2}: Incited Rabble gets +1/+0 until end of turn.

cards.flavor:
"Those who aren't welcome will know it!"
—Kolman, elder of Gatstaf
cards.name: Unruly Mob
cards.text: Whenever another creature you control dies, put a +1/+1 counter on Unruly Mob.

cards.flavor: Geists seeking redemption must first be given the opportunity.
cards.name: Vessel of Ephemera
cards.text: {2}{W}, Sacrifice Vessel of Ephemera: Create two 1/1 white Spirit creature tokens with flying.

cards.flavor:
"Metamorphosis is a process."
—Laboratory notes
cards.name: Aberrant Researcher
cards.text:
Flying
At the beginning of your upkeep, put the top card of your library into your graveyard. If it's an instant or sorcery card, transform Aberrant Researcher.

cards.flavor: The final pages of the experiment log were blank. Investigators found it abandoned on a desk in the researcher's lab, open, the pages flipping in the wind from a shattered window.
cards.name: Perfected Form
cards.text: Flying

cards.flavor: Some minds bend under pressure. Others break.
cards.name: Broken Concentration
cards.text:
Counter target spell.
Madness {3}{U} (If you discard this card, discard it into exile. When you do, cast it for its madness cost or put it into your graveyard.)

cards.flavor:
"The appearance of these warped stones throughout the provinces is too pervasive to be random. More evidence is needed to determine the reason behind them."
—Tamiyo's journal
cards.name: Catalog
cards.text: Draw two cards, then discard a card.

cards.flavor: "So much for neighborly hospitality!"
cards.name: Compelling Deterrence
cards.text: Return target nonland permanent to its owner's hand. Then that player discards a card if you control a Zombie.

cards.flavor: Everyone has something to hide.
cards.name: Confirm Suspicions
cards.text:
Counter target spell.
Investigate three times. (To investigate, create a colorless Clue artifact token with "{2}, Sacrifice this artifact: Draw a card.")

cards.flavor: "No matter the cost, I must discover the source of these strange happenings."
cards.name: Daring Sleuth
cards.text: When you sacrifice a Clue, transform Daring Sleuth.

cards.name: Bearer of Overwhelming Truths
cards.text:
Prowess (Whenever you cast a noncreature spell, this creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.)
Whenever Bearer of Overwhelming Truths deals combat damage to a player, investigate. (Create a colorless Clue artifact token with "{2}, Sacrifice this artifact: Draw a card.")

cards.flavor: When all logical solutions fail, try an illogical one.
cards.name: Deny Existence
cards.text: Counter target creature spell. If that spell is countered this way, exile it instead of putting it into its owner's graveyard.

cards.flavor: "Angels and inquisitors terrorize villages, but no one seems to notice the stirring out at sea."
cards.name: Drownyard Explorers
cards.text: When Drownyard Explorers enters the battlefield, investigate. (Create a colorless Clue artifact token with "{2}, Sacrifice this artifact: Draw a card.")

cards.flavor: Seagrafs yield an abundance of resources for stitchers and ghoulcallers alike.
cards.name: Drunau Corpse Trawler
cards.text:
When Drunau Corpse Trawler enters the battlefield, create a 2/2 black Zombie creature token.
{2}{B}: Target Zombie gains deathtouch until end of turn.

cards.flavor:
"The tides have begun to ignore the moon."
—Tamiyo's journal
cards.name: Engulf the Shore
cards.text: Return to their owners' hands all creatures with toughness less than or equal to the number of Islands you control.

cards.flavor:
"Is this what you found, Tamiyo?"
—Jace Beleren
cards.name: Epiphany at the Drownyard
cards.text: Reveal the top X plus one cards of your library and separate them into two piles. An opponent chooses one of those piles. Put that pile into your hand and the other into your graveyard.

cards.flavor:
"When all else fails, follow the geist's lantern."
—Vallon, Thraben inspector
cards.name: Erdwal Illuminator
cards.text:
Flying
Whenever you investigate for the first time each turn, investigate an additional time.

cards.flavor: A spirit is both fettered and free—bound in some ways to its previous existence, yet able to transcend much of the corporeal.

cards.text: Exile target creature you control, then return that card to the battlefield under its owner's control. If it's a Spirit, put a +1/+1 counter on it.

When Fleeting Memories enters the battlefield, investigate. (Create a colorless Clue artifact token with "{2}, Sacrifice this artifact: Draw a card.")

cards.flavor:
"My earliest work escapes me."
—Stitcher Geralf

cards.text:
Skulk (This creature can't be blocked by creatures with greater power.)

"In terms of intelligence, homunculi are somewhere between humans and skaabs—clever enough to follow more complex orders, but dim enough to not question them."
—Stitcher Geralf

Enchant creature

cards.flavor:

+1: Scry 1, then draw a card.
−2: Return target creature to its owner's hand.
−8: You get an emblem with "Whenever an opponent casts his or her first spell each turn, counter that spell."

Target creature gets -4/-0 until end of turn.

Return target creature to its owner's hand.
Madness {U} (If you discard this card, discard it into exile. When you do, cast it for its madness cost or put it into your graveyard.)

cards.text:
Flying
Prowess (Whenever you cast a noncreature spell, this creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.)

{1}{G}, Exile a creature card from your graveyard: Investigate. You gain 2 life.

cards.flavor: "The clues have begun to reveal a truth I hesitate to accept."

cards.text: Reveal the top five cards of your library. Put up to two instant and/or sorcery cards from among them into your hand and the rest into your graveyard.

cards.flavor: "‘I'm certain that the fate of Markov Manor is connected to these cryptoliths . . .' This Tamiyo was on to something."

cards.text: {T}: Target player draws a card, then discards a card.

cards.flavor:
"Dear brother, it's sweet that you have chosen to share your toys with Ludevic, but I too have found some new playmates."
—Ghoulcaller Gisa
cards.name: Rise from the Tides
cards.text: Create a tapped 2/2 black Zombie creature token for each instant and sorcery card in your graveyard.

cards.flavor:
"Your recent work is an inspiration. I have the utmost respect for your approach, and your craft is impeccable. At your convenience, I would be honored to collaborate on a project."
—Ludevic, letter to Geralf

cards.flavor: Nephalia is home to many hard-shelled creatures of unusual size, the largest of which are either avoided or worshipped.

cards.flavor: It's not just a feeling—you are being watched.

Enchant creature

cards.flavor:
"It serves as evidence of the ancient power of the deep, a reminder that the sea is the only thing worthy of reverence."
—Runo Stromkirk

cards.flavor:
